item.title: A Touch of Applesoft BASIC
item.description: A Touch of Applesoft BASIC came with the Apple IIc Plus that I excitedly received on Christmas day in 1988. Due to games like Oregon Trail and Think Quick! I am certain that I didn’t even open the book until several years later. Before this book I did not understand that it was possible for a normal person to write a computer program and run it on a computer. There was a reference in the back of the book that pointed to Applesoft BASIC Programmer’s Reference Manual and I decided that this was a must-have since it contained about 250 additional pages on the subject.
